items.text: flatter delivery on middle stump, but Hetmyer paddle sweeps this square to the fielder in the deep
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he tries to cut off the back foot. But the ball turns inwards, takes Hope's inside edge, and almost crashes into leg stump! Lucky
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle, but Hetmyer pulls this down the ground to long on. Off the bat's inside half on this occasion
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and he carves a drive past the diving cover fielder! Uses his wrists to place this brilliantly past the infielder. Shows the class he actually possesses
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: good length outside off, and he punches this with the bat's open face. Straight to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: full on middle, and he mistimes the straight drive off the front foot. Once again spliced off the bat's inside half. Goes to the bowler
items.postText: Ramachandran Sh: "Can't help but feel that WI would have been in so much better position had Hetmyer come in at 3. Not really sure why WI management persist with a messed up batting order"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he defends with the bat's open face. Allows Hope to run this shot down to third man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, but angling away from Hetmyer. He tried to drive square, but the ball kept moving away, eventually sneaking past the bat's outside edge as well
items.postText: Jewel: "Rubel is becoming source of runs for indies. Should be rotated soon "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: hits his face! Full on middle, and he tries to paddle-sweep fine. But the ball hits his glove, and then the grille of his helmet
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: full on middle, and worked towards the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, and he goes onto the back foot. Whips a shot off his pads to the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: drifting down leg, and Hetmyer goes down on one leg to paddle. Finds short fine leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: good length outside off, but straightening after pitching. He goes onto the back foot and punches to long on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: full, but down the leg side. Keeper can't collect either, and short fine leg runs to his left and intercepts
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 2 wides

items.text: good length outside off, and he walks across to the off side to cut
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, and Hope goes for the expansive cover drive. Times it well too, but finds the infielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: good length on off, and Hope opens his stance to work this to the leg side. Played to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, and Hetmyer carves a cut off the back foot to the fielder in the deep
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: goes for the big shot! But dropped! Full outside off, and spinning away after pitching. Hope goes for the big inside-out lift over extra cover, but slices it in the air. Rubel - at long off - runs to his right to take the catch, but he fluffs it
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: good length on off, and he paddles this square to short fine leg
items.postText: Davo from Guyan: "Calm down guys... bare in mind here, these boundaries are very small. 90 from last 10 with 8 or 7 in hand isn't impossible."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: good length on off, and he punches this down the ground. But Mashrafe, at short mid on, runs to his right and stops the ball
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: full on middle, and going down leg. Hetmyer taps it to the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: quicker ball on leg stump. Hetmyer tries to place this past short fine leg, but the ball hits his pad instead
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run
